system.description:
A normal-looking musical instrument which is cursed to hamper the owner if blown in perilous circumstances.

  • Under normal circumstances: Blowing the horn has no special effect.

  • In perilous circumstances: (e.g. in the presence of hostile monsters.) Blowing the horn causes a mass of bubbles to froth out and cover the characterâ€™s head. This causes blindness for [[/r 2d10]] rounds.
